name: David Ramirez
text: Oh, sure, it's practical for one private citizen to go to Davao to start his own investigation into abuses that Human Rights Watch and Amnesty International have been trying to get investigated for a decade, gather evidence and file a case himself. It's not like it was hard for a United Nations special reporter to investigate it. It's not like the ombudsman's office is just too scared to do anything about it. Easy.    While I'm at it, I'll also solve the traffic problems in Manila. Like, next year.
